The authors report increased glutamate and energy metabolism while the OLPs were in space for 26 days . They also show that after space flight, OLPs (SPC OLPs) display significantly increased mitochondrial respiration and glycolysis . The functional and molecular relevance of these specific pathways are promising targets for therapeutic intervention for humans in long-term space missions .

We sought to determine the impact of space flight on the global metabolomic profile of the secretome produced by OLPs while in space-µG in order to start unraveling extracellular processes, as well as identifying gravitational-sensitive molecules .

Human OLPs grew optimally at a pH of 7.4; the culture medium was buffered with HEPES . The culture medium that fed the cells during the ascent to space was recovered automatically from the cell chamber . The fresh medium in tank 1 fed the OLPs while onboard the ISS for 26 days . The comparison of the control medium and the secretomes from the OLPs grown in SPC or 1G shows that the SPC OLPs secreted about half of the pyruvate and phosphates of the 1G OLPs .

Glutamine, glutamine and α-KG were released at a high level in both 1G and SPC conditions . N-acetyl-glutamate was lower in the 1G medium than in OSM, suggesting a shift from uptake to secretion in 1G to SPC . Lipids (phospholipids) generated higher signals in the cell secretomes  In space, OLPs secreted significantly more glycerophosphoinositol than OLPs in 1G . In contrast, SPC OLPs . secreted less palmitoyl-GPC than 1G OLPs <em>n = 5 .

Metabolic dysfunction is commonly associated with MS . There are several patterns of de-myelination and several classifications of MS . It has been reported that OLs’ metabolism is impacted by dimethyl-fumarate .

OLs support glutamatergic transmission through GS, but their progenitors may also play an important role in the glutamatorgic pathway even before myelination takes place . α-KG is shown to induce the demethylation of histones as a cofactor of histone demethylases .

Abnormal or impaired OLs result in severe CNS pathologies during development and in neurodegenerative disorders . In most myelin disorders, OLPs are present but fail to mature . In the present study, we found that OLPs secreted phospholipids in a higher quantity in SPC than in 1G .
